about_the_game:
Help our little vampire Darby getting out from his eternal prison. Log on into a difficult 2D pixel platformer, find out secret rooms, defeat great bosses and end up discovering why Darby has been imprisoned in his own castle!

  • A singleplayer adventure about a kind kid vampire.

  • Get through a lot of difficult passages inside a gotic vampire castle.

  • Use vampire unique blood magic to reach new places.

  • Defeat great puzzle bosses.

  • Discover a great chiptune retro soundtrack. Feels OooooOooold...

    Jump, glide, create blood platforms, dodge terrible dangers. Die, repeat, die, repeat, die, repeat until you get into your objective. Don't worry, Darby knows how to teleport to the previous checkpoint before he dies. Those are super vampire powers...!

    Jump, glide, create blood platforms, dodge terrible dangers. Die, repeat, die, repeat, die, repeat until you get into your objective. Don't worry, Darby knows how to teleport to the previous checkpoint before he dies. Those are super vampire powers...!
name: Darby Is Here Forever

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel 1.60GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 3.10GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
